root.name: Frank Herbert's Dune
root.description: Overview The protagonist, Paul Atreides is sent to administer the planet Arrakis, the source of the galaxy's spice. After Paul's father is betrayed and murdered by the Harkonnen, he seeks refuge among the planet's inhabitant warriors - the Fremen. You will have to free them from the desolate conditions their home planet is in and avenge your family. Gameplay Players can control Paul from a third person perspective as they navigate the harsh terrain of the desert planet. Paul has access to a variety of ranged weapons and knives for close combat, all accessible through an inventory system. The gameplay is a mix of stealth elements and action/adventure. The mission based story takes the player through the various locals as you try to strike back against the Harkonnen. Soundtrack The game's music score is from the original TV series score.
